data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Name one interesting thing about you that not many people know. Why don't many people know this about you? How do you think your friends would react if they knew this about you?
data.answer: It is not known by many people that I'm actually very good at cooking, and I even take a cooking lesson twice a week just to enhance my cooking skill. I think learning to cook is very interesting and it is an essential life skill that we should all possess. A good homecooked dish is the best way to be sure of what you are eating and will contribute to a healthy lifestyle. Not many people know this about me because I'm still not very good at it. I still have a long way to go and I'm not intended to announce it to my friends yet. I guess if I tell my friends that I know how to cook, I think they would be astonished, which is also my intention that I want to give them a big surprise.（140字）
